description: This file defines a React hook 'usePlayer' that manages audio playback, including controlling an HTMLAudioElement, handling backend streaming sessions via API calls, and exposing playback controls and state.

methods.name: resolveTrackId
methods.description: Resolves a track ID from various possible object shapes.

methods.name: usePlayer
methods.description: Main hook managing audio playback state, controls, and backend session lifecycle.
